titleInfo.title: ‘Abū-Shahr Peninsula. By Lieut. A.W. Stiffe. H.M.I.N.’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:580 x 587 mm, on sheet 902 x 642 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Published by order of Her Majesty’s Secretary of State for India in Council.Distinctive Features:Note below scale: ‘This map is from a plane-table survey, based on a careful triangulation; the part north of the town, creeks, &c. are taken from the chart of the harbour by Comr. Constable and Lieut. Stiffe. It is intended as an illustration of the Campaign of 1856-7 in the peninsula’.Includes an inset plan of Būshihr at top centre.Legends and notations concerning the area cover the face of the map.Manuscript copy of this map at IOR/X/3117/1.Inscriptions:Signed in the bottom left-hand corner ‘Trel. Saunders, engraver 1875’; and in the bottom right-hand corner ‘A.W. Stiffe delt.’
